title: Morgan Stanley's Hornbach Favors 'Belly' of Yield Curve (Audio)
itunes:title: Morgan Stanley's Hornbach Favors 'Belly' of Yield Curve (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Matthew Hornbach, Global Head of Interest Rate Strategy at Morgan Stanley, on the global bond rally and negative rates.
